subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: At the start of this week, which will go a long way toward deciding who plays at the 2010 World Cup, one soccer player who outshone the entire collection of Real Madrid's new galácticos was apparently not even close to selection for Spain.
snippet: At the start of this week, which will go a long way toward deciding who plays at the 2010 World Cup, one soccer player who outshone the entire collection of Real Madrid's new galácticos was apparently not even close to selection for Spain.
